info.title: Open SDK Packages Manager
info.description: Handles all SDK packages that are open to developers.

prop.name: xmlParser
prop.description: The DOMParser object that edits the privileges file.

method.name: __construct
method.description: Initialize the class and load the privileges file. The file will be created, if accidentally erased.

method.name: getPackages
method.description: Get all Open SDK Packages by library name.
method.returndescription: An array of all packages as nested arrays for every library.

method.name: setPackages

parameter.name: $packages
parameter.description: An array of all packages as nested arrays for every library.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.
